name: Environaut\Runner\IRunner
short_desc: Interface all check running instances must implement.
long_desc:
Runners
 should get the necessary data via setters, then run() should
 be called and the report getter used afterwards.

setCache.name: setCache
setCache.short_desc: Sets the readonly cache used by checks to determine if they've been run before and if they can reuse prior settings to let users just confirm settings etc.
setCache.long_desc: The cache instance should've already been loaded and thus contain everything needed for the checks.

cache.name: cache
cache.short_desc: instance that already contains all cached settings loaded for checks

setConfig.name: setConfig
setConfig.short_desc: Sets the given config on the runner.

setCommand.name: setCommand
setCommand.short_desc: Sets the command on the runner to have access to the input and output.

setParameters.name: setParameters
setParameters.short_desc: Sets the given runtime parameter on the runner.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.short_desc: runtime options understood by the runner

run.name: run
run.short_desc: Execute the checks that are defined in the config and generate a report to consume by others.
